carnival_start: ^"So this is nice, right? All those lights, food, and games!"
^"Yeah, yeah, definitely! I mean, who doesn’t love overpriced snacks and neon lights? Classic first-date material."
^"I wasn’t sure if you were into this kind of thing. I thought maybe you’d prefer… I dunno… something more low-key? Like a sewer tour or something?"
^"Oh, come on. That’s such a stereotype! Just because I grew up in the sewers doesn’t mean I still hang out there. You don’t see me asking if you’d rather scavenge a park bench."
^"Fair point. I guess I didn’t want to assume. It’s just… I don’t usually do this."
^"Dates. I mean, birds aren’t exactly known for commitment, you know? We’re more of a fly-in, fly-out kind of species."
^"Rats have kind of the opposite problem. We’re pack animals. Lots of cousins. Aunts. Uncles. Sometimes it’s… a lot."
^"Oh, I get that! My flock can’t keep out of my business. When I told them I was meeting you, they were like, 'A rat? Really? Are you feeling okay?' Like I don't have standards."
^"My cousins are everywhere. My uncle runs half the street carts in town."
^"Oh yeah? Maybe he’s here. You think we could get free snacks?"
^"Pfft, knowing him? He’d charge me double just for showing up."
^"Ooh, I used to love these! Total junk, but I don’t know… something about them. Maybe it’s the colors. Or the way they catch the light. Like tiny little treasures."
^"So, you’re secretly a hoarder? Good to know."
^"Not hoarding, just… appreciating. There’s a difference!"
^"Now that? That’s more my speed. Like, I know it’s just sugar and air, but there’s something fun about it. You barely even get to eat it before it melts away."
^"See, that’s where we differ. I’m a chef... I want food that lasts."
^"Yeah! Like a soft pretzel. You gotta tear into it, work for it. Plus, the salt? Perfection."
^"Ehh, too much salt. But hey, you do you."
^"You know, I like places like this because they’re distracting. There’s always something to look at. All the colors, the movement… it’s like your brain never sits still."
^"Huh. I guess I never thought about it that way. I usually just focus on the food."
^"A rat only focusing on food. Shocking…"
^"Hey! I’ll have you know rats are very charming. We’re resourceful, adaptable, and great at finding food."
^"What, you want me to find you a five-star meal in a trash can...'cuz I can---?"
^"No...!? I mean-- let’s put those scavenger skills to the test."
^"How about a challenge? We each find things here for the other. Winner gets to pick where we go next time."
^"Alright, alright. But let’s be clear--I am the king of scavenging. You don’t stand a chance."
^"Big talk. Let’s see if you can back it up."
^"Ten minutes. Meet back here. No excuses."
